text: Manuel Rodríguez Vega (born 16 January 1944) was a Chilean footballer and manager. His brother Juan was part of the Chilean 1974 World Cup squad. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Universidad de Chile * Campeonato Nacional (4): 1962, 1965, 1967, 1969 ==References== * Category:Living people Category:1944 births Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean football managers Category:Universidad de Chile footballers Category:San Luis de Quillota footballers Category:Primera División de Chile managers Category:Primera B de Chile managers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Santiago
title: Manuel Rodríguez Vega
